Mass shootings have become more deadly in the last decade

in the US

For the purpose of this chart, mass shooting has been defined as an incident where four

or more people have been injured or killed.

4000

Spike due to 2017 Las Vegas shooting

where 59 were killed, 441 injured

Source: Gun Violence Archive. Data unavailable for Hawaii and North Dakota.

Number of mass shootings can depend on multiple factors such as state−wise demographics, gun laws and gun ownership.
